text:
hey everybody we're David of the
planet D and welcome to our channel

are you looking for inspiration and
information would travel.
Well you've come to the right place

Dave I have been to more than 100
countries on all seven continents
With 15 years of travel experience under our belts
We live by the motto adventure is for Everyone

so whether you find adventure
is going to a market in Marrakech,
or jumping out of an airplane we got exactly what you are looking for.
So we are traveling the world inspiring adventure in everyone
As we meet unique cultures,
we try interesting foods and we take on some great epic challenges
Like cycling the continent of Africa, hiking to Mount Everest Base Camp.
Or even kayaking in Antarctica.

what makes us unique is we travel as a
couple

which some people might sound a little
bit strange that we spent 365 days a year

Seven days a week together. But hey
I think we figured it.
Yeah, we push each other out of our comfort zone, we inspire each other to take risks
And try new Things.
But we have so much fun traveling its our  passion, it's our life

And we hope that you enjoy our travel videos
that we post twice weekly every Tuesday

Thursday and you can get them straight
to your inbox if you subscribe right here
